channel.title: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?
channel.description: I downloaded no-ip but i have no idea how to use it and i want to host my server.

item.title: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?
item.dc:creator: @volarscape volarscape
item.description:
@volarscape wrote:

www.whatsmyip.com, this tell’s you your current ip, but if your asking for hacker’s to come join you i’d go on www.no-ip.com, make a new account on it if you don’t have one already then press add hosts type the server name you want then it’s done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?

item.title: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?
item.dc:creator: @Anti_Pizza Anti Pizza
item.description:
@Anti_Pizza wrote:

I made a account
download what program
how do i get a specific server online i have 3
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2007, 03:11:38 PM[/size][hr]Ok i have got it to log me in on my ip but when i register it. A message comes up that says this server is offline and needs to be online to work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?

item.title: How do you find your servers ip address or get one?
item.dc:creator: @Xblad3rX Xblad3rX
item.description:
@Xblad3rX wrote:

make your account on website.

download program.

make an IP on website.

bring up the program.

check off your servers ip.

make sure what you checked off blushes.

run your server.

put on server status if you want.

PLAY!

Read full topic
